column4: Hi, I have a problem with my screen resolution, its seems that the xorg server from breezy doesn't support 1600x1024 very well. http://vern.chem.tu-berlin.de/~stephan/images/ubuntu-cinemadisplay.jpg
Against which package should I fill a bug report?
xserver-xorg would probably be the best place to report a bug against...xorg is being updated pretty much daily though
